messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/8/2002 7:01:37 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I guess this is going to be confusing for a while. The HSC---California s homeschooling
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/8/2002 7:01:37 PM Eastern Standard Time,
PSoroosh@... writes:
> > Is the information out on the price and hotel accomodations for the SC
> > conference? I haven't gotten any details yet.
> > It doesn't usually come out until mid-April, at the earliest. Remember -
> we're talking about a mid-AUGUST conference <g>.
> --pam
>

I guess this is going to be confusing for a while.

The HSC---California's homeschooling conference---their website is up, but
not finished. It's in August.

The SC Unschooling conference---Live & Learn---is in ...well....South
Carolina. That website should be available next week, and also not quite
finished---we'll both be adding on for a while. It's in October.

Sandra's speaking at both. CA's is in Sacramento and is 11 years old. SC's is
in Columbia, and it's our first year.

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
